name: df-pfx
body: |- wceq(cpfx, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, cn0, co(cv(s0), csubstr, cop(nat0, cv(s1)))))
comment: Define an operation which extracts prefixes of words, i.e. subwords (or substrings) starting at the beginning of a word (or string). In other words, ` ( S prefix L ) ` is the prefix of the word ` S ` of length ` L ` . Definition in Section 9.1 of [AhoHopUll] p. 318. See also Wikipedia "Substring" ~ https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Substring#Prefix . (Contributed by AV, 2-May-2020.)
